projects.name: 長榮大學職涯網
projects.depiction: 當初長榮大學的職涯發展組需要一個可以讓學生媒合企業的平台，於是邀請資管系學生幫忙建構網站，網站的規模為資訊系統，具有申請會員、學號第三方登入、上傳工作機會、學生應徵工作、工讀單產生..等功能，使用MS SQL資料庫。

projects.name: 逢甲大學 多媒體暨網路安全實驗室
projects.depiction: 逢甲大學多媒體暨網路安全實驗室的網站，內容為歷屆學生論文上傳、學生論文報告簡報、教授演講簡報..等教學資源，並與張講座個人網站共同經營。

projects.name: Ozen's personal website (2014)
projects.depiction: I learned many popular web technologies in 2014. And want to build a personal web page, So did this work. At the time it was using the 'Auto' nickname, And founded the 'Autoplay' brand.

projects.name: Ozen's personal website (2015)
projects.depiction: I remade my personal webpage in 2015. I liked listening to EDM at that time and knew Steve Aoki. Use his film in tomorrowland as the theme of the web.
